name: Topaz Drop Earrings
description:
Eye catching, glamorous earrings comprising of a handmade sterling silver decorative section with a faceted oval Topaz gemstone drop detail. 

The decorative section of these earrings measures approximately 20mm whilst the Topaz itself measures 7x5mm

These earrings are made to order so please allow 10 working days from purchase to receive your item

If you have any questions relating to this item then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Cross Stud Earrings
description:
Handmade in sterling silver these little earrings are perfect for everyday wear and relaxed, laid back style. 

Created by Zoe using sterling silver strip wire, these earrings are available in both polished silver and dark, oxidised silver. 

Each earring measures approximately 10mm

The earrings are supplied gift boxed and are made to order. Please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item. 

If you have any questions relating to these earrings then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com
..............................................................................................

These earrings can be made in gold for a more luxurious finish. Please contact Zoe prior to purchase to discuss this option -mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Amethyst Drop Earrings
description:
These earrings are perfect for a glamorous evening or a special occassion. 

A sterling silver section in a decorative style gives these earrings a vintage feel whilst the oval, faceted amethysts catch the light and add a splash of rich colour.

The silver decorative section of the earring measures 20mm whilst the amethysts are 7x5mm in size

The earrings are supplied gift boxed and are made to order so please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item.
..............................................................................................

These earrings can be custom made to include a different gemstone of your choice or can be made in gold for a more luxurious finish. Please contact Zoe prior to purchase to discuss the options available - mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Decorative Bangle
description:
This bangle is a classic piece made entirely by hand in Zoe's Forfar workshop. 

The decorative section of this bangle has been hand pierced from a sheet of sterling silver before being soldered to a 2.5mm thick wire. The finished bangle has then been oxidised to give the overall piece a deep, dark hue. 

The decorative bangle section measures approximately 55mm x 23mm.

The bangle is supplied gift boxed and is made to order so please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item.

If you have any questions relating to this item then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Motif pendant
description:
This pendant comprises two hand pierced motifs which have been soldered together to form a decorative 3D pendant. 

The pendant measures just under 20mm and hangs from a long 25 inch trace chain, secured by a t-bar catch. 

This is the perfect necklace for stylish everyday wear and can be worn alone or combined with other pendants for a more eye catching look

The necklace is supplied gift boxed and is made to order so please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item.

If you have any questions relating to this item then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com
..............................................................................................

This necklace can be custom made in yellow or white gold for a more luxurious finish. Please contact Zoe prior to purchase to discuss this option further - mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Patterned Pearl Pendant
description:
This necklace has been created by hand in sterling silver before being oxidised to give a dark patina which contrasts beautifully with the subtle pink of the freshwater pearl nestled in the centre. The delicate surface pattern was applied using a brass plate in the rolling mill and gives the pendant even more feminine charm. 

The pendant has a lovely weight and measures approximately 40mm x 20mm and is hung from a 17" trace chain secured by a t-bar catch. 

This necklace lends itself perfectly to luxury, laid back style and would look beautiful teamed with a pretty blouse or high necked top. 

The necklace is supplied gift boxed and will be made to order so please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item. 

If you have any questions then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Butterfly and Shield Pendant
description:
Quirky and charming - this feminine pendant comprises a hand pierced shield design with a polished silver butterfly silhouette adorning it's surface. The shield has been etched with a fragment of text which adds interest to the overall piece. 

The pendant section measures approximately 25 x 18mm and hangs from a 20 inch trace chain, secured by t-bar catch. 

The pendant is supplied gift boxed and is made to order so please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item.

If you have any questions relating to this item then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com

name: Patterned pearl wire ring
description:
These chunky, oxidised silver rings are the perfect accompaniment to any look. The delicately patterned surface lends the ring a softer, more feminine look whilst the pearl wire provides the perfect focal point detail. 

These rings are made from 10mm wide sterling silver sheet which has been oxidised to give a dark finish and they have a lovely heavy weight to them. 

The ring will be supplied gift boxed and is made to order so please allow up to 10 working days from purchase to receive your item. 

Please contact me with your ring size upon purchase of your ring - mail@zoeduthie.com

If you have any questions relating to this item then please contact Zoe prior to purchase - mail@zoeduthie.com
